Safety
The safest place to change a 
nappy	is	on	a	mat	on	the	floor.	
If you use a higher surface, 
keep your hand on your baby 
at all times to stop them rolling 
off.	See	page	169	for	how	to	
change your baby’s nappy. 
It can be easy to get confused about what you really need for your baby. You can always ask your 
midwife or health visitor for advice on what to buy, and you may be given a list of essentials at 
your antenatal classes or by your maternity service. There are some essent
